name: Christchurch Helicopters
about: Christchurch Helicopters is New Zealand's leading helicopter training school, located at Harewood Aviation Park, Christchurch. With over 20 years of experience, we offer the New Zealand Diploma in Aviation, preparing students for careers as commercial helicopter pilots. Our instructors have over 153 years of combined experience and provide industry-specific training, including commercial, agricultural, tourism, and firefighting operations. We operate a range of aircraft, including the Cabri G2, and emphasize safety and professionalism. Our program ensures graduates are employment-ready with additional qualifications such as dangerous goods handling. With a stable and supportive learning environment, we are committed to aligning our training with industry standards and needs, ensuring our graduates are well-prepared for their careers.
